meanings.definition: To float on the surface of water.
meanings.sent1: The leaf was outfloating on the pond.
meanings.sent2: The boat was outfloating peacefully on the calm lake.
meanings.sent3: The rubber duck was outfloating happily in the bathtub.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts seemed to outfloat above her worries.
meanings.sent5: The outfloating clouds painted a serene picture in the sky.

meanings.definition: Floating on the surface of water.
meanings.sent1: The outfloating lily pads created a beautiful scene on the pond.
meanings.sent2: The outfloating buoy marked the safe swimming area.
meanings.sent3: The outfloating ducks looked like a peaceful family.
meanings.sent4: Her outfloating hair shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The outfloating log served as a resting spot for birds.

meanings.definition: The act of floating on the surface of water.
meanings.sent1: The outfloating of the boat was a calming sight.
meanings.sent2: The outfloating of the leaves indicated the arrival of autumn.
meanings.sent3: The outfloating of the swans was a graceful dance on the lake.
meanings.sent4: The outfloating of the clouds mirrored the stillness of the water.
meanings.sent5: The outfloating of the debris showed the impact of the storm.
